## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G03320](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G03320)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PBL40, PCRK2</u>
- **Gene Name:** PBS1-Like 40, PATTERN-TRIGGERED IMMUNITY COMPROMISED RECEPTOR-LIKE CYTOPLASMIC KINASE 2
- **Description:**   Protein kinase superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
